alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 2:25AM CST until February 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will cause blowing snow and will reduce visibilities to less than a quarter of a mile. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Lake, Central St. Louis, Northern Aitkin, South Aitkin and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band, the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion area and the Mille Lacs Band, East Lake and, Big Sandy Lake areas. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Flash freeze potential with slushy roads will cause tricky travel.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Aitkin
